properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where FolderPath endswith "\\netscan.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoProductName =~ "Network Scanner" or ProcessVersionInfoFileDescription =~ "Application for scanning networks"

tags.name: description
tags.value:
Detects usage of SoftPerfect's "netscan.exe". An application for scanning networks.
It is actively used in-the-wild by threat actors to inspect and understand the network architecture of a victi
